edition: Anukul Chandra Banerjee: Prātimokṣa-sūtra (Mūlasarvāstivāda), Calcutta 1954. [First published in IHQ 29 (1953), pp. 162-174.] Reprinted with slight modifications (not indicated) as: Prātimokṣa Sūtra, in: Two Buddhist Vinaya Texts in Sanskrit, Prātimokṣa Sūtra and Bhikṣukarmavākya, ed. Anukul Chandra Banerjee, Calcutta 1977, pp. 1-56. Faks. in GBM 17-60.
